bioconda.name: chorus2
bioconda.summary: A pipeline to select oligonucleotides for fluorescence in situ hbridization (Oligo-FISH).

biocontainers.name: chorus2
biocontainers.summary: A pipeline to select oligonucleotides for fluorescence in situ hbridization (Oligo-FISH).

biotools.summary: Chorus2 is a tool for design of genome-scale oligonucleotide-based probes for fluorescence in situ hybridization.

bioschemas.name: Chorus2
bioschemas.summary: Chorus2 is a tool for design of genome-scale oligonucleotide-based probes for fluorescence in situ hybridization.
